sentence: Overall trip was not pleasant due to the poor treatment but a few limited staff at breakfast housekeeping and maintenance
The furniture in dining area needs updating dirty and oldThe evening drinks fine but horduerves were porThe other complaint is the outrages parking fees

Shower handle broken asked that it be repaired while I was gone for the day got back to room and handle still broken handle fixed late and broke again next morning again asked that it be repaired while I was gone for the day when I got back asked if it had been repaired and no one knew there was anything wrong with it
The accommodations were dated and the bathroom is in need of updating
Poor upkeep in general the rooms are older and have accumulated lots of damage
Could be time soon for some updates to soft goods
Motel could use updating carpet ragedy and needed repainting
it is clear to see that some updates have been made to the rooms however there is much more to do
Along with a few other posters I would concur the rooms are in serious need of an overhaul
First off I understand they are renovating starting 2017
Room was updated and quiet and had nice city mountain views but was not exactly clean
Still under a bit of renovations but very comfortable and spacious room
Hotel is being renovated however my room 82 had been updated and was very nice
Close to everything and the rooms were redone to be more modern
This hotel was recently updated and is very nice
Our rooms on the 7th floor were all updated CLEAN super comfy beds newly tiled bathrooms and new furniture
There were lots of overhead TVs as well that kept us updated on News Sports and Hurricane Irma
The rooms are updated and very clean
Our room was on the 17th floor and really nice and clean modern and updated
All amenities are updated 2 TVs and 2 sinks
Time to update shower

The rooms were comfortable The staff is polite staff maintain the rooms well cleaning staff was above average the desk in the living space had loose legs about to fall apart maintenance issue that ought to be dealt with overall a good experience
Nice hotel with updated rooms and a nice restaurant accessible through the lobby
